trans-unit.source: The base class for discoverable references using XML Web services discovery.

<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> all inherit from <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference>, and represent the three types of documents discoverable through XML Web services discovery: Service Descriptions, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and discovery documents, respectively.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"></xref> used in a discovery process.
An instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"></xref> used in a discovery process
Gets the name of the default file to use when saving the referenced discovery document, XSD schema, or Service Description.
Name of the default file to use when saving the referenced document.
Returns a file name based on the passed URL.
The URL on which the name of the file is based.
Name of the file based on the passed URL.
Reads the passed <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> and returns an instance of the class representing the type of referenced document.
The return value is always an <xref:System.Object>.
However, the underlying type varies, depending on the type of document referenced.

For instance, a <xref:System.IO.Stream> passed into <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.ReadDocument%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
<xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> containing the reference document.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> with an underlying type matching the type of referenced document.
Downloads the referenced document at <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Url"></xref> to resolve whether the referenced document is valid.
Downloads the referenced document and then invokes the overloaded <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Resolve%2A> member that takes a MIME type and a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.

If the MIME type and the contents of `stream` match those expected by the reference type, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol"></xref> property is `null`.
Resolves whether the referenced document is valid.

If the MIME type and the contents of `stream` match those expected by the reference type, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.
The MIME type of stream.
The <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> containing the referenced document.
Gets or sets the URL of the referenced document.
The URL of the referenced document.
When overridden in a derived class, writes the document to a <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
The document to write into a <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
The into which the document is written.
